capture() - Method in class net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.utils.PingPongBuffer
Starts and/or continue ping-ponging, begin capturing on the next available buffer, returns the result of the previous PingPongBuffer.capture() call.

captureEnd() - Method in class net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.PostProcessor
